title: Authorizes and directs the conveyance of certain lands owned by the New York State Thruway Authority in the City of Lockport in the county of Niagara to Hydraulic Race Co., Inc.
summary: Authorizes and directs the conveyance of certain lands owned by the New York State Thruway Authority in the City of Lockport in, the county of Niagara to Hydraulic Race Corporation.
actClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing the conveyance of certain lands owned by the New York state thruway authority in the city of Lockport in the county of Niagara to Hydraulic Race Co., Inc.
